string.text: I've heard of you. They say good things about you. Let's talk, from time to time. A friendship with someone like me can be quite profitable for someone like you.
I have asked many sacrifices of my men in {FIRST_NAME}'s service. I will not hear it said that their loyalty was misplaced.
You raided my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Do you think me weak? Do you think you can steal from my villagers and not pay a price in blood?
You have my allegiance.
I don't expect you to surrender, but I'll give you the chance to do so.[ib:warrior][if:convo_stern]
Is this important? I'm rather busy right now.
I think I have heard your name. I believe you caused some trouble for us.
That raid on {VILLAGE_NAME}... Hard on the farmers there. Well, anyway, I'm sure the {ENEMY_NAME} would have done the same to us.
You came through on that task I gave you. I thank you.
Yes... I believe I may have heard your name.
Very well. It is settled, then.
You can surrender, but I hope you don't. I'd enjoy sticking a blade into you until you squeal.[ib:warrior][if:convo_mocking_predatory]
I've got you cornered. Yield, or we shall attack.[ib:warrior][if:convo_aggressive]
I know your name. They say you are a most valiant warrior. I can only hope that your honour and mercy matches your valor.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the {CLAN_NAME}.
When you walk these roads, my friend, know that nothing escapes the notice of the Hidden Hand. Lords and emperors come and go, but we remain.
Still your tongue! You'll have need of it shortly, to beg for mercy
My lady
Actually, I think I will keep you in captivity, as my prisoner.
I have heard of you. I am not in a mood for banter, so let us dispense with the courtesies.
sultana of the Aserai
What? I don't understand.
Enough! You win today, you dog! Ach, the shame of it![if:convo_angry]
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}.
I shall mark down your name. But you shall have to earn my trust, stranger, for the world is a treacherous place, and these are treacherous times.
Pleasure to meet you.
high queen of the Battanians

Perhaps one day we shall see each other on a battlefield. You shall know the Ghilman by the splendor of our steeds and the shimmer of our steel. If we are on your side, you may rejoice. If we are your enemy, you may save yourself a great deal of trouble by running away before the fighting starts.
It is a momentous step that I am about to take, and this makes it easier.
I doubt the {VILLAGE_FACTION} will like what we did back there in {VILLAGE_NAME}...
I'll remember your name.
Thank you again for all your help.
king of the Vlandians
Very well - I shall put your courage to the test!
It is good to know who one fights.

If you're ever looking for stout warriors, friend, you should think about hiring the Company of the Boar. The stoutest lads in Vlandia flock to our banner. Because if you don't hire us, your enemy might.
Very well. What do you propose?
Uphold the rights of the poor and the meek, of the widow and the orphan, and the Heavens will take note.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {FACTION}.
You may be of humble birth, but you seem like the type who will rise in the world. Suppose you were to come to a position of power and responsibility. How would you use it?
You're a handsome devil, aren't you? Bet you're a load of trouble, though.
Remember how I beat you, one-on-one? Are you back for more?
That job you did for me... Nice work.
We have the advantage of you. Yield, and you will be well-treated.[ib:warrior][if:convo_stern]
The common folk of these lands need someone looking after them. That's where our Brotherhood comes in. You'll hear us called bandits or robbers. Don't believe a word of it.
Yes... We were both at that tournament here, right? So disappointing... Here's hoping that scoundrel {WINNER_NAME} loses the prize in a game of dice.

I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. I am sure you have heard the name of our clan in the epics of the steppe. We carry the name of one the 12 sons of the great she-wolf, mother of the Khuzaits.
May {?GENDER}she{?}he{\?} crush all {?GENDER}her{?}his{\?} foes!
Your lordship
So, you weren't able to complete that task... Well, sometimes these things are out of our hands... and sometimes not. But let us not dwell on this.
Ah yes. I believe I have heard your name. It is indeed a pleasure to meet face to face.
I've heard of you. They spoke of you as an impressive warrior. They had not mentioned that you were so, em, charming.
I'm sure you remember how {TOURNAMENT_WINNER} won that tournament in {TOURNAMENT_TOWN}... A more undeserved victory I never saw....
It is good to meet you. Remember, there is no currency in this world more valuable than the weight of your word, so speak truthfully with me, and I shall do the same with you.
Know that if you ever cross me, you'll wind up as food for the ravens.
You are outmatched today. Give up if not for your own sake, then think of your men![ib:warrior][if:convo_thinking]
Stop! I yield![if:convo_beaten]
I won our last duel, but you fought well. I wouldn't blame you if you wished for a rematch.
You are, I hear, a man of the world, as they say. Tell me a bit about your journeys.
Perhaps it will not be today, or tomorrow, but one way or the other I will see that you regret your decision.
Am I? So refined is your cruelty, that you would rather see me free and humiliated, than in chains. Enjoy your triumph![if:convo_contemptuous]
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the house of {CLAN_NAME}.
I know your name. They say you are a {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} of valor. If fate ever decrees that we cross swords, it would be an honor.
I don't know your name. But no matter. Some say there is greater honor to found a great lineage than to be born with one.

If you ever find yourself in a position to hire warriors, you should consider the Legion of the Betrayed. We know what it means to honor your word and contract, as we have seen the price of breaking faith.
I'm not sure what to make of you, except you're either very brave or very rash, or both.
Enough! I am your prisoner. I can pay a ransom. I am worth more to you alive than dead.[if:convo_thinking]
{FIRST_NAME} is my liege. That's all there is to say.
I guess that task I gave you didn't work out.
The Beni Zilal are the keepers of the secret. We watch from the shadows. Make foes of us at your peril.
Hah! I want to fight with you
They say you have travelled quite widely. Tell me a bit about your journeys...
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We hold our lands in fief to {LIEGE_TITLE}, and we honor our oaths of fealty.
Unfortunately, at these odds, it would be rather foolish of me not to attack you.
I've heard of you! I have long wanted to make your acquaintance.
So, you won that tournament... Well, luck always plays a part in these things, that's for sure.
I shall remember your name.
You've got no chance. Surrender or I'll gut you like a fish.[ib:warrior][if:convo_angry]
I'm sure you remember how {TOURNAMENT_WINNER} won that tournament here... A more undeserved victory I never saw....
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the {CLAN_NAME}.
My lads and I... Whatever you've heard, we respect authority. We hope we can be of service.
The one thing about me you should know, is that I make a very good friend and you absolutely do not want me as an enemy.
No. That doesn't work.
Your last drop of blood? I guess I'll just have to spill it, then.
You cannot defeat me, and I'll teach you a painful lesson if you try. Yield![ib:warrior][if:convo_angry]
I have heard of you. Your name strikes fear in men's hearts. That is the best kind of reputation to have. Perhaps we may have interests in common.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, one of the ancient lineages of the Sturgians.
Maybe you have not heard of the Karakhergit. We do venture much into the sewn lands, the corrupt lands. We bow to no Khan. We sew no grain. We keep to the old ways, out amid the great grasses.
I shall put this bluntly. You are not from a good family. Some would say you are setting your sights too high. But suppose you were to rise in the world. What would you do?
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Empire.
I've heard of you. At last we meet. You sound like a good {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} to know. Let us speak together, from time to time.
I know your name -- and from what they say about you, I'd say that many a grieving widow knows too. But that is no concern of mine.
You raided my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Now I've brought you to battle. Defend yourself!
How about that tournament here, eh? And to imagine those contestants thought they had a chance against me
I know your name. It's good to meet.

You may know of the Skolderbroda. On the battlefield, we are second to none. We expect to be paid according to our worth, and that is not cheap, but if we take your coin, you will have our oath to honor the terms of the contract, to our death if necessary.
So... You've made quite a name for yourself...
Ah, look, I'd be happy to shed my blood for your cause. But I have to look out for my kin, and for those who look to me for protection. I need more from you.
Long may {?GENDER}she{?}he{\?} live!
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has served the kings of the Vlandians for generations.
How about that tournament in {TOURNAMENT_TOWN}, eh? And to imagine those contestants thought they had a chance against me
Oh, I suppose I'm obligated to give you a chance to grovel for your life. Will you surrender, then?[ib:warrior][if:convo_mocking_predatory]

So... I've heard you've travelled around a fair bit. No doubt you've seen a lot of strange and awful things. Maybe you've done a few strange and awful things. Go on, tell me a bit about your journeys. I promise not to be shocked.
Yeah... I know your name. Right. I'm not one for chat, so let's skip the soup and go straight to the meat.
My lady, if you are skilled as arms as you are fair in countenance, then your enemies should indeed fear you!
Don't say I didn't give you a chance.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Vlandian kingdom.
It is good to meet you. Always remember that while courage is commendable, compassion is the greatest of virtues.
How gallant. I hope some day I may be in a position to return the favor.
Thank you. I must remain your enemy, but I am grateful nonetheless.[if:convo_relaxed_happy]
You raided my tenants at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Needless to say, I am not pleased with this.
You asked for a parley. I will trust you will honor the customs of war and attempt no tricks.
It grieves me to fight you, but I must. Unless of course you wish to surrender.[ib:warrior][if:convo_stern]
I am sure someone with your reputation knows that nothing in this world is as valuable as the weight of your word. Speak truthfully with me, and I shall do the same with you.
I'm not sure that you can offer me anything that I would not do better simply to take.
I heard you raided {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. That's my property, you cretin. You think you can make me look weak? You'll die for this.
What exactly are you proposing?
So, about that task I gave you... Well, I can only hope that you gave it your best try, and you'd said you would.
Naturally, I wish {?GENDER}her{?}him{\?} a long life and victory over all {?GENDER}her{?}his{\?} foes. To say anything else would be treason, as I'm sure you know.
As I see it, we have nothing to discuss.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, a loyal servant of {LIEGE_TITLE}.
I know your name. Men praise your valor. But remember that honor and compassion are also worth cultivating.

Oh, I suppose I'm obligated to give you a chance to surrender, but I hope you don't. I'm rather looking forward to seeing how well attached your head is to your neck.[ib:warrior][if:convo_mocking_aristocratic]
Alas, I guess we simply don't see eye-to-eye on this.
So be it!
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}.
Yes... We were both at that tournament in {TOURNAMENT_TOWN}, right? So disappointing... Here's hoping that scoundrel {WINNER_NAME} loses the prize in a game of dice.
I yield! Grant me the honors of war, and do yourself credit![if:convo_thinking]
Yeah... I know your name. I've got nothing against you, friend. Stay out of my business, and I'll stay out of yours.
I'm glad that we could come to an understanding on that recent matter.
Remember our duel? It was a good fight. But with the advantage I have now, I'm afraid I can't afford to be so sporting.
No... Unless you can give me more, I can't do it.
It was an honor to compete against you in that tournament here.
Your ladyship
I'll mark your name.
I will always listen to a {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} of integrity. On the other hand, if you lack that, please do not plague me with your company.

You may have heard of us. Men call us the Embers of the Flame. Generations ago, Heaven instructed us to prepare for a great cleansing of the land. Until that day, we smolder in silence. But when that day comes, our righteous wrath shall burn forth.
You're outnumbered. Give up. Or don't. Death in battle is a fine thing.[ib:warrior][if:convo_bored]
{FIRST_NAME} has always fulfilled {?GENDER}her{?}his{\?} duty to me, and I intend to do the same.
I know that the task I gave you was not easy... Well, let's not speak of that anymore.
It's good to meet you.
Ah, yes. From what they said of you, I had imagined someone whose blade was still dripping with the blood of her enemies, not someone with your grace and charms.

I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. They say our ancestor was among those who came in the golden ships that came to this land from the West, in the Time of the Heroes. Of course, if you believe that everyone said to be on those boats was on those boats, they'd have capsized from the weight.
I shall mark down your name. Now, do not take it amiss if I do not immediately extend my hand in friendship, for the world is a treacherous place, and I have learned to be wary.
If you ever want a chance for glory, you might want to consider fighting for me. One day you can tell your grandchildren that you served under my command.
I can't say that I've heard the name, but it's good to make your acquaintance.
For every house of mine that you burned when your raided {SETTLEMENT_NAME}, I'm going to carve another piece from your body.
I'm not one of those who loves war for its own sake. But I still need reliable warriors who are true to their word. I will keep faith with all those who keep faith with me.
I've heard of talk of you -- the woman who knows how to fight like a man.
I have not seen you since that tournament in {TOURNAMENT_TOWN}. Perhaps one of us shall have better luck next time.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, and I am honored to serve you.
We have heard of your cruel deeds when you raided my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. I am responsible to protect my tenants, and if I cannot protect them, to avenge them.
My son
It was an honor to compete against you in that tournament in {TOURNAMENT_TOWN}.
You are an enemy, and therefore you will remain a prisoner.
One thing you should know: If you cross me, you'll regret it.
Brave words are easy. We'll see what happens.
I know your name. It strikes fear in men's hearts. That is good. Perhaps we should speak together, some time.
It's Fortune's idea of a good joke to make old friends fight. Shall we dance to her tune, or do you want to give up?[ib:warrior][if:convo_nonchalant]
It is my duty to fight you
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the {CLAN_NAME}, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, and I am honored to serve you.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the {CLAN_NAME}.
So... Not long ago, you betrayed my trust. Do we really have anything to discuss?
They say you've travelled widely. Such terrible times we live in, so much hardship. What do you think of what you've seen?
No. That's not enough, for what you're asking me to do.
rightful emperor of the Calradians
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has stood in the Senate and discharged its duties honorably since the first days of the Empire.
I am glad to meet you.
I've never heard of you. No doubt another vulture come to this land to grow fat on the leftovers of war.
What do you take me for? A plotter? Whatever you suggest had best be honorable.
I thank you for what you did for me. You kept your word. Not everyone is so dependable these days.
I will hear you. I shall assume that you will not suggest anything dishonorable.
Eh. Good enough.
I give up! You fought well. There is no call for further bloodshed.[if:convo_thinking]
We can take no more! We have raised the standard of rebellion, and will fight the people's enemies until our just demands are met.
You raided my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Well, I'm here now to pay back what I owe you.

I have heard much about you. They say that you are the equal of even the bravest of men in your prowess at arms. Perhaps one day I shall try my valor against yours, either in a tournament or on the battlefield!
The odds are not in your favor today. You may fight us, but there is also no shame if you yield now.[ib:warrior][if:convo_thinking]
A pity you and I have to fight. Do you want to give up?[ib:warrior][if:convo_stern]
Have it your way.

We welcome strangers into our lands. The woods are wide, and there is game to be hunted and food to be gathered, enough for all. But there are some who come here to steal from us, to enslave us, or to tax us. Every spring, the bodies of those thieves are discovered in the thaw.
I know your name -- and from what I hear, I'll warrant that many a grieving widow knows too. But that is no concern of mine.
Your proposal is most acceptable.
Mm. Go on.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, a name you will have heard many times in the sagas of the Sturgians.
I am? Well... I am grateful.[if:convo_relaxed_happy]
I've heard your name.
Thanks again for agreeing to handle that matter for me.
Thank you. When you are finally defeated, I will request that your death be swift and merciful. Unless, that is, you care to join us... Good bye, for now.[if:convo_nonchalant]
That raid on {VILLAGE_NAME}... Well, the poor suffer for their lords' mistakes, so they say.
I am still recovering from the bruises you gave me.
Your highness
You may fight us, but many of your men will be killed, and you will probably lose. Yield, and spare us both the unnecessary bloodshed.[ib:warrior][if:convo_stern]
You raided my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. You'll die for that!
What happened at {VILLAGE_NAME}... I do not like attacking innocent villagers like that. I wish such things were not necessary.

I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. Our ancestors were among those who came from the far north to take the princes' denar and swear an oath to defend these lands, and we have held true to that oath.
khan of the Khuzaits
It goes without saying that you have my allegiance.
Never heard of you. Doubt you'll give me much trouble.
So that problem I asked you to take care of... Didn't go so well, I hear.
Ah, yes. At last we meet. You sound like a good woman to know. Let us speak together, from time to time.
It was a hard thing you did, when you raided my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. War is cruel, but don't make it more cruel than necessary.

I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. We received our title from the Emperor Vortios himself. Not that he had much choice about it, as he was held captive in one of our raiding ships at the time, but I'm sure he recognized the nobility of our blood.
Would you like me to give you another task, so that you can betray me again?
I have heard your name. People speak of your deeds. It is good to finally meet you.
I yield! You have won. Cursed be this day![if:convo_angry]
The Heavens will shall be done. But those who smooth the path shall be rewarded.

I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Though one should not be too proud of one's lineage, I am glad to say that we have always taken seriously our duty to protect the common folk of the Empire.
I know your name. I can only hope that what I have heard is not true.
I'm glad that you and I could reach an agreement, earlier.
But enough talking. Yield or fight![ib:warrior][if:convo_angry]
It's an honor to meet you, good sir.

You may have heard of us - the Eleftheroi. Our fathers were thieves and runaways and troublemakers - we won't deny it. We came here because they didn't want us anywhere else. But I'll tell you this - if the empire survives, it'll be thanks to men like us, doing the hard bloody work out here in the wild fields, not those who sleep comfortably in their beds.
I hear you're the one who raided my village of {SETTLEMENT_NAME} and lifted the crops and livestock. I suspect your men must have been hungry, but so are my tenants. Shall we battle for what's left?
I have not heard of you, but you have the look of a {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} who might make something of {?PLAYER.GENDER}herself{?}himself{\?}, some day.
Very well. I accept.
I've got you cornered. Yield or die.[ib:warrior][if:convo_aggressive]
You can't talk your way out of this.
You have my allegiance. If I hear a word spoken against you, I'll cut that person's tongue out.
Never heard of you.
I yield! Congratulations on your victory.[if:convo_beaten]
My child
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. There's not a clan of the Battanians who hasn't contributed the skull of one of their champions to our collection of drinking cups.
Very well. I am ready to do this.
Now don't take this the wrong way, but some would say that you're aiming a bit beyond your station. But lets say your rise in the world. What would you do?
My friend
My husband
The villagers at {VILLAGE_NAME} will remember us for a long time.
khatun of the Khuzaits
I wish it hadn't come to this.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}. Our family has served the Empire for generations.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, a clan of the Aserai.
I will honor the terms of the parley if you do likewise.
You are indeed a {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} of honor, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. I shall not forget this.[if:convo_relaxed_happy]
Some people say you will go far... Suppose you were to rise to a position of power. What would you do?
I do not recognize your banner, but clearly you are a lady of rank. Please consider me your most humble servant.
Heard you get around quite a bit... So... Tell me a bit about your travels, then.
I'm loyal to {FIRST_NAME}. No one better say otherwise.

They call us the Lake Rats, but we prefer to be known as the free people of the marshes. No prince or boyar can make us bow our heads and scrape our knees. Know that, and we can probably get along fine.
You asked for a parley. If you're tempted to try any tricks, do know I have some archers standing by to keep you honest.
Your tournament victory in {TOURNAMENT_TOWN}... Well, luck always plays a part in these things, that's for sure.
My wife
No -- I need more than that to be sure that I am not leading my followers to their deaths.
I shall have my scribes make a note of your name.
We're not putting up with it any more. We will spill the blood of the oppressors and anyone who stands in the way of our just wrath.
I am {LIEGE_TITLE}.
That task you took on for me. Very nicely done.
rightful empress of the Calradians
So... You really did me over. Not sure we have much to talk about now, after that.
So, my young lion. You have the look of someone who may go far, if they don't wind up dead.
queen of the Vlandians
I guess we don't have a deal.
I'm always looking for good fighters. If you ask about me, I suspect you'll be told that I take good care of my men.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the {CLAN_NAME}.
That raid on {VILLAGE_NAME}... Harsh, but let's hope it brings the war to a faster end.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. The fame of our family is second to none in the songs of the Battanians.

Perhaps you've heard of the Wolfskins, traveller. We are beasts. Know that so long as we eat no cooked meat, wear no woven cloth, and sleep under no roof, we cannot be touched by the laws of men. So tread carefully with us.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, one of the ancient lineages of the Battanians.
I hear your men raided the poor villagers of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. You should know that they're under my protection. Next time you raid a village, try not to get caught by it's owner...
That job I gave you... I'd say you let me down.
I'll deal with those who keep their oaths. If you're one of those who don't value their word, don't waste my time.
I've heard about you. So now we meet. I'm not one for talk, so if you have anything to tell me, say it.
What happened at {VILLAGE_NAME}... Well, war is cruel.
queen of the Sturgians
Right. So that wraps up our little arrangement then.
The villagers back there at {VILLAGE_NAME}... Those could have been my people...
Know that if you ever cross me, you'll wind up as food for the jackals.
You do yourself credit, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. I shall not forget this..[if:convo_relaxed_happy]
I'm sorry. I don't relish bloodshed, but I can't let you ride away to fight another day.
high king of the Battanians
You took my property when you raided {VILLAGE_NAME}, so I'm going to take your head and mount it to the first building we rebuild.
I have not seen you since that tournament here. Perhaps one of us shall have better luck next time.
Let's change the subject.
It's an honor to meet you, my lady.
Congratulations on your victory in that tournament in {TOURNAMENT_TOWN}.
I give up! I give up! Call back your dogs![if:convo_angry]
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} of the {CLAN_NAME}.
So it looks like we don't have a deal But come up with a better proposal later, and I will listen.
Good to meet you. Look, one thing I value is that people keep their word, so deal straight with me and I'll deal straight with you.
I'm free? Well... Good bye, then.[if:convo_nonchalant]
I've heard of you! It's very good to finally make your acquaintance.
Seek not the things of this world, but thirst after the divine truth.
I hear you have a habit of attacking helpless villagers, like my tenants at {VILLAGE_NAME}. I think you'll find my men a tougher morsel to chew.
Thanks again for taking on that little matter for me. Best of luck.
Again, I'm glad to have your assistance.
I'm sworn to {?GENDER}her{?}his{\?} service. That is all there is to say.
I've heard of you. At last we meet. You sound like a good {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} to know. Let us speak together, from time to time. We may be able to find arrangements that benefit us both.
We are at your mercy.[if:convo_beaten]
Do what you must.
sultan of the Aserai
It is good to know your name. If I see you at a feast, I'll know how to greet you, and if I see you in a shield wall, I'll know whom I slay.
I have heard much about you. Some men may fear a woman who is versed in the art of war, but I for one will not turn away hands that can grip a sword, should their owner be brave and loyal.
It is good to meet you. I am always looking for warriors who value courage, glory and a good name.

I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the house of {CLAN_NAME}, one of the most illustrious families in the annals of the Empire. The barbarians we have slain, and the glory we have won, is second to none.
Congratulations on your victory in that tournament.

Perhaps you have not heard of the Jawwal. Well, when you cross the desert, far from oasis and spring, in a land that others scorn, with thorns fit only for goats and camels, then you are in our domain.
Hmm. You have piqued my interest. What do you have to say?
The Heavens have blessed us with their commandments, which we must uphold and ensure others uphold.
Hah! I'll see you beg for mercy.
This is good. I'm glad that we could make this work.
Enough! I choose to live to fight another day. I trust you will respect the custom of war, and allow me to pay a fair ransom.[if:convo_thinking]
I think I know what you're saying. Honor precludes me from even considering it.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}. Our clan has loyally served the Khuzait Khanate for generations.

You attacked my village at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Oh, I won't pretend that my men would also have had a bit of fun if it was me paying a visit to your village. But as my tenants' protector, I have a certain obligation to avenge them a bit. Please don't take this personally.
king of the Sturgians
Thank you again for agreeing to handle that problem of mine. Best of luck with it.
I can offer you a glorious death in battle, or the hospitality of my dungeons.[ib:warrior][if:convo_mocking_teasing]
I've heard of you! A pity we should meet like this.
I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}, of the {CLAN_NAME}, the most ancient and noble of the Aserai lineages.
